reviews.text: Stayed overnight following a meeting I had in the city centre and was so pleased I chose this place.
reviews.title: What a gem!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Must return in the new year when I have more business in the city.
reviews.title: Don't bother,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic food, service and ambience. The only thing I didn't like? I couldn't have stayed longer.
reviews.title: Smashing little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Attempted to eat Sunday lunch here today, in a word horrific! We waited almost 3/4 of an hour for staters when our mains turned up, when our starters arrived 10 mins later the loosely named fondue was nothing more than congealed melted cheese swimming in oil! When the main course eventually arrived, the word poor is the being polite. Two tiny tough pieces of beef, almost raw veg (im all for al dente veg but this was raw)and Yorkshire pudding. If your considering it please don't waste your time!
reviews.title: Daylight Robbery

reviews.text: Just spent two nights at the Maltsters Hotel in Llandaff, Cardiff, Room was to a very high standard with Apple Mac tv/computer, free standing bath in room and fab rain shower in bathroom. Complete luxury! Breakfast was lovely and service great. Free car parking at this hotel which was good, Used the buses which are frequent for sightseeing trips into Cardiff city and Cardiff Bay.
reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.text: Stayed at the Maltsers llandaff for a 40th birthday bash at the nearby BBC Wales tv studio so location was perfect as within walking distance , i was very impressed not only with the designer rooms , only 5 of which make up this boutique hotel but they come complete with Apple media tv web dvd etc but in addition to this a wet tv in the bathroom , but also of the staff who were very friendly and helpful , the wife and i had a sandwich as a late afternoon snack and had arrived within 5 minutes of order and was very tasty . Free parking for hotel residents in a large rear car park
reviews.title: Impressed with maltsers

reviews.text: Breakfast in the morning was also served promptly and was delicious
reviews.title: Disappointing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all I recommend this hotel if a little on the pricey side at £85 for B&B but worth it .
reviews.title: Awful, Please, Please avoid!!!!!
Lovely atmosphere - Good Pub Food
reviews.text: I booked a room here as it is close to our office and adverse weather was forecast. I was suprised they no longer offered a company discount (this was due to 'new management') so paid the standard rate of £85 b&b.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was a double at the back with a corner aspect. It had no central heating and was cold. I plugged in the 2 oil filled heaters and went to the bar.
reviews.title: Not quite what we expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have eaten here on a number of times and the food is usually of a very good standard. This was also the case on Sunday when we had the Sunday roast. However,it is the service which really lets this place down. There doesn't appear to be enough staff to cover the tables and even when they are around they don't always want to acknowledge you. If this could be improved it would be an amazing place! Also on a positive it is great to find a place serving Sunday roasts in the evening!
reviews.title: Review of eating in restaurant 16th September

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent 4 nights at the Malsters Llandaff. This is a good base for reaching Cardiff City Centre, either on foot by walking the Taff Trail or a short bus ride into the city.
reviews.title: Great Location for Walking Taff Trail

reviews.text: We were given a warm welcome on arrival and allocated room number 1. The room was clean, spacious, the bed was large and comfortable. Free Wi Fi, Cable TV, Tea and Coffee making facilities, iron and board. The bathroom was a good size, full size bath with rain shower, plus a built in TV screen at end of bath.
reviews.title: wales can do alot better

reviews.text: We settled in and went along to the Bar for a light lunch, the bar was really busy for 3.00 pm on a Friday afternoon, which was a good sign. Lunch was enjoyable, so we reserved a table for an evening meal. Glad we made the reservation as the pub was full of diners. Dinner was also enjoyable and considering how full the bar was we were served quickly. Locally sourced produce on the menu, with lots of choice.
reviews.title: Lovely rooms in a very pretty part of Cardiff

reviews.text: Breakfast was also enjoyable with a good menu choice. Warm Welcome, Good Service.
reviews.title: The best of our pub stays in Wales

reviews.text: Swanky rooms with a designer feel behind this nice pub. My room had a big bath in the bedroom plus a large separate bathroom.
reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish

reviews.text: There's an Apple iMac in each room providing internet, TV, radio etc. I couldn't get the remote to work, but otherwise this felt like a step up from most hotels (and allowed me to book onward travel on the web).
reviews.title: What a shame

reviews.text: Rooms get a little bit of road noise but not bad (as they're by the side road, not the main Cardiff Road).
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was good, served by lovely manager, and dinner in the pub also excellent. (Good local "craft" beer too).
reviews.title: Dreadful food and shocking service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bedrooms were a bit too "designer" in my opinion - lots of gadgetry yet the door-closing mechanism was broken in my room and the card-slot for switching on the lights didn't always work first time - but overall this place leaves a good impression. Certainly it's much more comfortable than the Churchills down the road, which rates as poor.
reviews.title: Disappointing
